channel.title: Disable friendly fire
channel.description:
Hello, I'd really like to know how to disable friendly fire in this game. And, yes, I know it's not hard to stay my fire from friendlies. The reason why I'm really asking this is that I want the consistency between Black Mesa and Half-Life 2 to be optimal.
Actually, it would be better if somebody found a way to enable friendly fire in HL2 (bugless, preferably). If someone could tell me either of these I would be much obliged.
